price: 2. En je ziet dat de mensen in grote groepen Allah's godsdienst betreden (door zich te bekeren tot de Islam).
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
